mapper.select: SELECT user.id, user.username, user.password, user.create_time AS createTime, user.state, user.role_id FROM fud.user WHERE fud.user.role_id!=2 AND fud.user.role_id!=3
SELECT fud.user.* FROM fud.user WHERE user.username LIKE #{contents} AND fud.user.role_id!=3 AND fud.user.role_id!=2 ORDER BY fud.user.id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(fud.file.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS days,COUNT(*) AS upload FROM fud.file WHERE fud.file.create_time BETWEEN SUBDATE( DATE( NOW( ) ), INTERVAL 7 DAY ) AND DATE( NOW( ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(fud.download.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS days,COUNT(*) AS download FROM fud.download WHERE fud.download.create_time BETWEEN SUBDATE( DATE( NOW( ) ), INTERVAL 7 DAY ) AND DATE( NOW( ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fud.user WHERE fud.user.role_id=2 OR fud.user.role_id=3
